title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Wave Pattern", 1960s–70s
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on tracing paper overlaid on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on design, along lower edge: a series of numbers in all boxes [referring to weaving pattern]; along upper, lower margins and two side margins:  series of numbers [referring to weaving pattern]; in margin, below image:  number jottings.
provenance: Eric Elsesser, California; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A series of wave-like watercolor strokes running diagonally for lower left to upper right.  Over watercolor,  the surface is divided into small irregular rectangles with scales of numbers on all sides.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Wave Pattern", 1960s–70s. Brush and watercolor, graphite on tracing paper overlaid on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-82.
